content.prompt: Which of the following exemplifies the free-rider problem for interest groups?

choices.label: A supporter of the Second Amendment who is a member of the National Rifle Association (NRA)
A bird enthusiast who contributes to the Sierra Club to receive a free bird-watching guide
A teacher who does not join the local teachers union but receives a salary negotiated by the union
A 50-year-old woman who joins the AARP to get a discount card
